api_port.name: API Port
api_port.description: Port for external API access (used by Home Assistant sensors)

database_type.name: Database Type
database_type.description: SQLite (embedded, no dependencies) or PostgreSQL (external server)

postgres_host.name: PostgreSQL Host
postgres_host.description: IP address or hostname of PostgreSQL server

redis_url.name: Redis URL
redis_url.description: Redis connection string for background tasks (optional)

symbols.name: Trading Pairs
symbols.description: List of pairs to track (e.g., BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT)

fetch_interval_minutes.name: Fetch Interval
fetch_interval_minutes.description: How often to fetch candlestick data (in minutes)

analysis_enabled.name: Enable Analysis
analysis_enabled.description: Market analysis: Fear & Greed, derivatives, scoring

analysis_interval_hours.name: Analysis Interval
analysis_interval_hours.description: How often to run market analysis (1-24 hours)

bybit_api_key.name: Bybit API Key
bybit_api_key.description: Bybit exchange API key for trading portfolio

bybit_testnet.name: Bybit Testnet
bybit_testnet.description: Use Bybit testnet instead of mainnet

mcp_enabled.name: Enable MCP
mcp_enabled.description: Enable MCP server for AI agents (Claude, GPT)

backfill_crypto_years.name: Crypto History Depth
backfill_crypto_years.description: How many years of historical data to load (1-15)

ai_enabled.name: Enable AI Analysis
ai_enabled.description: AI market analysis via Ollama or OpenAI

ai_analysis_interval_hours.name: AI Analysis Interval
ai_analysis_interval_hours.description: How often to run AI analysis (1-168 hours)

notification_mode.name: Notification Mode
notification_mode.description: all - all notifications, smart - intelligent, digest_only - digest only, critical_only - critical only, silent - no notifications
